ANNOUNCEMENT.TITLE: Trading Competition
ANNOUNCEMENT.CONTENT:
Unifund | $iFund is proud to announce the first official Unifund Global Cryptocurrency Trading Competition with over 500k $iFund in Prizes.

On December 23rd the Fund Managers with the highest ETH gain and highest percent gain will receive the Grand Prize of 200K $iFUND each. An additional 50k iFUND will be split between members who joins the group.

The competition will be host to the top international cryptocurrency traders, or Fund Managers, to be the first to trade using Unifund.Global’s innovative Trading Platform built for token trading upon the Uniswap DEX Protocol.

Useful Links

Get iFUND on Uniswap bit.ly/myIFUND.

Telegram https://t.me/UnifundGlobal

Discord https://discord.gg/tGRdfsm

Twitter twitter.com/UnifundGlobal

Medium https://medium.com/@UnifundGlobal

Group Criteria:

To qualify, groups must...

  • Have at least 3 members including the manager.
  • Start with at least 10 ETH in trading capital.
  • Have a minimum of 50k iFUND as their groups collateral.

Fund Managers & Investors will be required to cover any/all gas fee’s associated with their Investment Contribution, Entry Fee, Collateral Stake and any Trades submitted via the Unifund Trading Platform

Unifund reserves the right to disqualify trades that are deemed to be wash trades or illegal bulk registration wallets, self-dealing or display attributes of market manipulation, etc..

Unifund reserves the right to cancel or amend any Activity or Activity Rules at our sole discretion.

Risk warning:

Cryptocurrency investment is subject to high market risk. Unifund is not responsible for any direct, indirect or consequential losses as a result of the trading competition. Please make your investments with caution.

TRADING_COMPETITION.INTRO: Unifund | $iFund is proud to announce the first Unifund Global Cryptocurrency Trading Competition.
TRADING_COMPETITION.TITLE: Unifund Trading Competition
TRADING_COMPETITION.SUB: On December 23rd the Fund Managers with the highest ETH gain and highest percent gain will receive the Grand Prize of 200K $iFUND each. An additional 50k iFUND will be split between members who joins the group.
TRADING_COMPETITION.DESCRIPTION: The competition will be host to the top international cryptocurrency traders, or Fund Managers, to be the first to trade using Unifund.Global’s innovative Trading Platform built for token trading upon the Uniswap DEX Protocol.

IFUND_TOKEN_HOLDERS: Les détenteurs de jetons $iFUND pourront créer un fonds de trading, rejoindre un fonds et bénéficier du Staking.

FIRST.TITLE: Bienvenue sur UNIFUND.global !
FIRST.BODY: Nous profitons de la nature décentralisée de la technologie blockchain pour fournir un point d’accès professionnel à une possibilité d’investissement unique menée par des traders chevronnés et des professionnels de l’industrie. br>Veuillez suivre notre tutoriel rapide…</br>

HEADERS.ABOUT: Un nouveau token pour créer des groupes de trading incitatifs

BODY.ANON_DEVS: équipe expérimentée - laissez le code parler pour lui-même
BODY.UNIQUE_SYSTEM: il ne s'agit pas d'un fork - l'ensemble du code est original - construit from scratch
BODY.ACCESS_TO_MORE_CAPITAL: Avoir accès à plus de capitaux en échange d’un pourcentage du rendement
BODY.LENDERS_REFUND: Les contributeurs se voient rembourser une partie de la garantie de la part des gestionnaires en cas de pertes

BODY.INTRO: Les groupes de trading UNIFUND sont la prochaine génération de trading social. En créant ou en rejoignant un groupe, vous avez accès à des avantages infinis
BULLETS: Un système de trading décentralisé avec une infinité de modèles de risque
Réduit la congestion du réseau en consolidant les transactions
Éliminez complètement les frais de trading en rejoignant des fonds
Accès à des capitaux supplémentaires pour maximiser la rentabilité
Alignement des intérêts entre traders et contributeurs
Permet la création de modèles de risques entièrement personnalisables

HOW_IT_WORKS.INTRO: Les groupes de trading sont le point central de la valeur ajoutée. Utilisée judicieusement, la participation à ces groupes vous fera économiser du temps et de l’argent, en éliminant les frais de négociation et en consolidant la prise de décision à enjeux élevés. Cette structure de groupe d’opt-in aligne les intérêts de tous les acteurs, créant un terrain d’entente intéressant où la collaboration mène à des profits plus importants pour tous.
BULLETS: Le Ratio du collatéral est déterminé en comparant la valeur des collatéraux iFUND des leaders à la valeur de fonds gérés en ETH
Le Ratio de du collatéral est un facteur majeur dans le profil de risque des groupes
comme une partie des fonds en collatéral des gestionnaires sonts consommés en cas perte, plus ces chiffres sont proches, plus le risque est égal pour les deux parties
une valeur iFUND plus élevée favorise les contributeurs au fonds et une valeur ETH plus élevée favorise le gestionnaire.
Le ratio du collatéral, la liste de trading, le temps d’exécution et les frais d’entrée sont les principaux facteurs du profil de risque d’un fonds
HOW_IT_WORKS.WARNING: Un groupe qui utilise une liste personnalisée peut être dangereux

TRADE_GROUP_METRICS.INTRO: Quand un gestionnaire ouvre un fonds, il doit configurer les attributs suivants, ce qui donne un profil de risque-rendement qualitatif que les participants potentiels au fonds peuvent examiner :
BULLETS: Le montant des jetons iFUND qui sera mis en collatéral
Le montant des jetons iFUND que les utilisateurs devront payer pour rejoindre le fonds
La liste des paires Uniswap spécifiques qu’ils échangeront contre l’ETH du fonds
La durée de vie du fonds (en jours ou en semaines)
La limite maximale de fonds (en ETH) que le groupe sera en mesure d’accepter
La limite maximale de fonds (en ETH) que chaque utilisateur peut verser au fonds.
TRADE_GROUP_METRICS.SUB: Bien que l’ouverture d’un fonds soit gratuite, les gestionnaires de fonds, en mettant leurs propres jetons IFUND en collatéral, réduisent le risque de perte des autres participants et incitent ainsi plus d'investisseurs à se joindre à leur fonds. À son tour, cela donne aux gestionnaires de fonds plus de capital à échanger et leur permet de percevoir des frais d'entrée et des commissions. Pour ces participants, les frais perçus sont minimes par rapport aux frais potentiels sur la blockchain.

SECTION_TOKEN.INTRO: L’approvisionnement total de trente-sept millions de jetons au maximum {{valeur}} a été émis au moment de la création du projet.
BULLETS: 40% a été fondu contre des ETH, durant le Token Generation Event
20% est bloqué sur Uniswap avec la moitié des ETH du TGE
10% est utilisé pour les récompenses de Staking
10% est réservé aux concours de trading
5% est dédié au budget marketing du projet
15% est bloqué pour l’attribution récompenser l’équipe au fil du temps
SECTION_TOKEN.TOKEN_USAGE:
Le jeton iFUND est utilisé de trois façons :

  1. Staking pour les récompenses.
  2. Comme collatéral pour créer un fonds.
  3. Frais pour rejoindre les fonds.
SECTION_TOKEN.TOKEN_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Tous ces cas d'usage impliquent le blocage du jeton. Les frais d’entrée de groupe sont bloqués avec le collatéral du gestionnaire de fonds jusqu’à la fin du cycle, tandis que les autres utilisateurs peuvent faire du staking pour des récompenses sans risque. br/>br/> La part dédiée des jetons de l’équipe sera lentement débloquée au fil du temps.

SECTION_STAKING.INTRO: Le pool de récompense pour le jalonnement est de plus de 3 millions de jetons iFUND. Retrouvez tous les détails sur notre système de staking sur Medium.
BULLETS: Le staking sera actif pendant au moins 6 mois à mesure que les récompenses seront distribuées.
Les récompenses de staking diminueront au fil du temps.

SECTION_GAMIFICATION.TITLE: Théorie du jeu de la plateforme Unifund
SECTION_GAMIFICATION.PARAGRAPH_ONE: Deux classements immuables intégrés au système présenteront les meilleurs gestionnaires de fonds par notionnel et par pourcentage. Donner la possibilité de grimper les classements et de développer une solide réputation.br/>br/> La conception de ce système a des avantages supplémentaires de plus haut niveau pour l’écosystème Ethereum. Il aide les petits traders, réduisant la charge globale du réseau et la congestion en consolidant tant de trades disparates.br/>br/> Récemment, les trades d’Uniswap peuvent coûter de cinq dollars (5$) à plus de vingt dollars (20$) en période de congestion du réseau. En établissant une norme selon laquelle de nombreux traders mettent leurs fonds en commun sous le contrôle temporaire d’un seul gestionnaire de fonds, les frais seraient éliminés pour l’utilisateur et compensés pour le gestionnaire de fonds en fonction de leurs profits.
SECTION_GAMIFICATION.SUB_TWO: Concours de trading et campagnes parrainées par Unifund
SECTION_GAMIFICATION.PARAGRAPH_TWO:
Transitioning the thrill of the market to a socially harmonized smart contract doesn’t have to mean losing all the fun of that market’s rollercoaster. With this in mind, we’ve designed some contests which will further gamify users’ participation in this system. Every month for ten (10) months, three hundred seventy thousand (370,000 iFUND) tokens will be awarded, dispensed as six (6) distinct prizes.

In each of these contests, the automatic prizes will be delivered to the top three (3) Fund Managers by notional gain, and the top three (3) Fund Managers by percent gain. As the platform develops we may alter the reward structure if we find something better suited. Within those tiers, distribution of prize tokens will be awarded as follows:
SECTION_GAMIFICATION.DESCRIPTION:
Two immutable leaderboards built into the system will showcase top Fund Managers by both notional and percent. Granting the opportunity to climb the leaderboards and develop a strong reputation.

This system’s design has additional higher-level benefits for the Ethereum ecosystem. It helps small traders, reducing overall network load and congestion by consolidating so many disparate trades.

Recently, Uniswap trades can cost anywhere from five dollars ($5) to more than twenty dollars ($20) in network congested times. By establishing a norm where many traders are pooling their funds under a single Fund Manager’s temporary control, the fees would be eliminated for the user and offset for the Fund Manager based on their gains.

TRADE_CONTESTS.INTRO:
Transitioning the thrill of the market to a socially harmonized smart contract doesn’t have to mean losing all the fun of that market’s rollercoaster. With this in mind, we’ve designed some contests which will further gamify users’ participation in this system. Every month for ten (10) months, three hundred seventy thousand ({{value}} iFUND) tokens will be awarded, dispensed as six (6) distinct prizes.

In each of these contests, the automatic prizes will be delivered to the top three (3) Fund Managers by notional gain, and the top three (3) Fund Managers by percent gain. As the platform develops we may alter the reward structor if we find something better suited. Within those tiers, distribution of prize tokens will be awarded as follows:

SECTION_AUDIT.INTRO: We successfully passed the Hacken Code Review and Security analysis of our Group Manager contract. This audit ensures that it is safe to use our product to create trading groups for any investors and traders. Feel free to dig into the audit paper for the details.
SECTION_AUDIT.SUMMARY: TL;DR - As a summary we can present you the following:
SECTION_AUDIT.CRITICAL_SEVERITY: No critical severity issues were found.
SECTION_AUDIT.HIGH_SEVERITY: No high severity issues were found.
SECTION_AUDIT.MEDIUM_SEVERITY: No medium severity issues were found.
SECTION_AUDIT.LOW_SEVERITY: No low severity issues were found.

SECTION_THE_PROJECT.QUOTE:
"In life, as in Chess, one’s own Pawns block ones way.
A man’s very wealth, thoughts and emotions which should often help him to win, more often checkmate him."
SECTION_THE_PROJECT.TITLE: Say goodbye to portfolio checkmate.
SECTION_THE_PROJECT.SUB: 86% of Cryptocurrency Traders reported that inexperience, limited capital, stressful trading environments & outrageous gas fee’s were emptying their pockets. That all changes now.
SECTION_THE_PROJECT.SUMMARY: The World’s first Cryptocurrency Mutual Fund Trading Platform for the open creation of trustless social trading groups utilizing Uniswap Protocol Tokens.
BULLETS: Decentralized Free Market Platform allowing Risk-Adjusted Mutual Fund Creation.
Reduces Protocol & Network congestion by consolidating trades.
Eliminates trading fees by joining funds, or ‘social trade groups’.
Pooled Capital maximizes profitability while evenly distributing risk.
Aligns incentives & risk tolerance of previously competing traders.
Trade Contests & Leaderboards encourage skilled traders to perform at their best to earn a higher profit-take % as reputation & demand soars.

SECTION_FOR_INVESTORS.TITLE: Unifund For Investors
SECTION_FOR_INVESTORS.INTRO:
The goal of every cryptocurrency investor is to position their capital today so as to profit from future developments. Easier said than done. It’s reported that 86% of cryptocurrency traders admit that, inexperience, limited capital, lack of inside knowledge alongside stressful & competitive trading environments + the added expense of trading & gas fee’s are emptying their pockets.

This inspired us to engineer the world’s first social trading group platform that introduces the every day innovative investors to join risk-adjusted mutual funds, or trade groups, built & managed by skilled traders. This legacy approach to investing leverages pooled capital to maximize profitability, evenly distribute risk amongst stake-holders and pocket those profits all while participating in a global community united by crypto, as it should be.
SECTION_FOR_INVESTORS.BECOME_INVESTOR: Become an Investor | How to Join A Fund

BULLETS.heading: Get $iFUND bit.ly/myIFUND
BULLETS.paragraph: Our native token ‘iFUND’ is required to pay for Fund entry fee’s set by the Fund Manager.

BULLETS.heading: Launch the Unifund Platform and Connect Digital Wallet
BULLETS.paragraph: We support most major digital wallets. Make sure you’ve added our iFund token using the official contract address: 0x04B5E13000C6e9A3255Dc057091F3e3Eeee7b0f0

BULLETS.heading: Browse Fund Listings and Select the Open Fund that perfectly suits your Risk / Reward profile and investment goals.
BULLETS.paragraph: Social Trade Groups, or ‘Funds’ are the central point of generative value within our contract system’s design. Utilized wisely, participation in these groups will save you both time and money, eliminating trading fees and consolidating high-stakes decision-making. This opt-in group structure also aligns the incentives of previously competing traders, creating an interesting middle ground where collaboration leads to greater profits for all.

BULLETS.heading: Pay Entry Fee + Invest your Stake, and voila - you’re in!
BULLETS.paragraph: Once you’re transferred your capital + paid fund entry fee, you can request on-demand statistics of your funds asset allocation and fund managers performance expressed as a PNL% by the Unifund Community Telegram and Unifund Fund Performance Channel.

SECTION_FOR_MANAGERS.TITLE: Unifund For Fund Managers
SECTION_FOR_MANAGERS.INTRO:
The skill of Cryptocurrency trading is truly an artform, and many experienced traders have invested years of their time, and individual capital into developing their craft and earning consistent, steady profits while building a strong portfolio.

With Unifunds incentivized trade groups, any skilled trader can instantly become a Fund Manager and leverage pooled capital to yield higher profits, reduce market competition and earn a sizeable profit take % at fund maturity - will you be the next to claim the fame as Top Fund Manager on the Global Unifund Leaderboard!
SECTION_FOR_MANAGERS.BECOME_INVESTOR: Become a Fund Manager | How to Create a Fund

BULLETS.heading: Get $iFUND bit.ly/myIFUND
BULLETS.paragraph: Our native token ‘iFUND’ will act as the collateral for the Funds ‘Stake Ratio’. This ratio determines how investors grade the risk profile by comparing the value of the leaders iFUND collateral, to the value of the ETH the group will trade with on the Uniswap Protocol.

BULLETS.heading: Launch the Unifund Platform and Connect Digital Wallet
BULLETS.paragraph: We support most major digital wallets. Make sure you’ve added our iFund token using the official contract address: 0x04B5E13000C6e9A3255Dc057091F3e3Eeee7b0f0

BULLETS.heading: Select Create Group and Build your Fund
BULLETS.paragraph: Our innovative Social Trade Groups, or ‘Funds’ are the central point of generative value within our contract system’s design. Utilized wisely, proper creation of your Fund will earn you a sizable profit-take % and contribute to your leaderboard statistics while lowering trading fees as you leverage pooled capital to maximize larger profits. We have equipped the Fund creation process with unique metrics allowing you the opportunity to align incentives and risk profiles of interested investors and inform them of your trading style or strategy for the fund.

BULLETS.heading: Stake Your Collateral + Publish your Fund Listing
BULLETS.paragraph: Once you’ve transferred your collateral ( it’s optional as a fund manager to invest / contribute to your own fund, do so are you please) and are satisfied with the risk profile you have built, click Create to publish your fund to the Unifund Directory and begin attracting investors to your fund.

GET_ACCESS_TO_SEASONED_TRADERS: Join a Group and get access to professional and seasoned traders.

QA.QUESTION: What will you do if this contract breaks?
QA.ANSWER: If such a circumstance arises, we will migrate to a new contract and send all users the new token at a 1:1 ratio.

QA.QUESTION: How do I know which groups are safe to join?
QA.ANSWER: Managers will develop reputation over time, and the Trade List should be carefully checked before joining any Trade Group. Groups with more iFUND staked by the Fund Manager compared to the value of ETH collected offer a better risk-to-reward ration for users.

QA.QUESTION: Who are you and why are you remaining anonymous?
QA.ANSWER: We are releasing our fully functional system and want the focus to be on hte product and not its creators.

QA.QUESTION: Why are you doing a sale instead of letting us yield farm for distribution?
QA.ANSWER: Yield farming systems disproportionately reward whales, so we consider a sale significantly fairer.

QA.QUESTION: Why don’t you have a burn mechanic?
QA.ANSWER: Burns inflate the cost of transactions, and we don’t believe they have much effect outside marketing.

QA.QUESTION: Is this system sustainable long term?
QA.ANSWER: The functionality of this product is designed for bull markets, but we have plans to enable short trades before the market turns down.

QA.QUESTION: Can this be used to scam people?
QA.ANSWER: If it gets popular, we’re sure scammers will try, just as they have with Uniswap. This is the reason for the front-end delay: we aim to do as much as possible to protect our users.
